isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 550 AND TU-FLO 750 - MAINTENANCE - LUBRICATION

svcproc.title: LUBRICATION
svcproc.para:
Every six months, 1800 operating hours or 50,000 miles (80,450 km) (whichever occurs first),
check external oil supply and return lines, if applicable, for kinks, bends, or restrictions to flow. Supply lines must be a minimum of 3/16" I.D. and return lines must be a minimum of 1/2" I.D. Oil return lines should slope as sharply as possible back to the engine crankcase and should have as few fittings and bends as possible. Refer to SPECIFICATIONS for oil pressure minimum values.
